name: local-sync
description: A friendly, tiny, synchronous, namespaced, and dependency free local storage solution.

scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:docs: npm run jsdoc2md && npm run doctoc && npm run build:umd && cp dist/umd/* docs/dist
scripts.build:umd: npm run webpack -- -p --output-filename local-sync.min.js --optimize-dedupe --optimize-occurence-order --optimize-minimize && npm run webpack
scripts.prerelease: npm run build && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.release:major: npm run prerelease && ta-script npm/release major
scripts.release:minor: npm run prerelease && ta-script npm/release minor
scripts.release:patch: npm run prerelease && ta-script npm/release patch

author: TechnologyAdvice <devteam@technologyadvice.com>
